document.title: FoLiA-Linguistic-Annotation-Tool
document.intro: FLAT is a web-based linguistic annotation environment based around the FoLiA format (https://proycon.github.io/folia), a rich XML-based format for linguistic annotation. Flat allows users to view annotated FoLiA documents and enrich these documents with new annotations, a wide variety of linguist...
